DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate pre-lens tear film stability new CE-marked daily disposable contact lens compare commercially available daily disposable contact lens .
DOC.brief_title: Daily Disposable Contact Lens Tear Film Study
DOC.criteria: Be legal age consent sign Informed Consent document . Willing able wear spherical contact lenses 16 hour . Willing able wear spherical contact lens within available range power . Best correct spectacle visual acuity equal well 20/25 6/7.5 . Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Anterior segment infection , inflammation , abnormality . Any use systemic medication contact lens wear could contraindicate . History refractive surgery irregular cornea . Currently enrol clinical trial . Eye injury within twelve week prior enrollment . Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
